channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Paint around pothole now disappeared as pothole got larger, 20th February
item.description:
See previous report. Large pieces of tarmac and gravel from under the tarmac strewn across road. There is not pavement so pedestrians walk along this road, this is a trip/fall hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Shaw Green Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 20th February
item.description:
Multiple of potholes o/s of a primary school.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 20th February

item.title: Deep dangerous pothole around busy junction, 20th February
item.description:
Immediately on turning left from Benhall Avenue onto Bibury Road, dangerous position meaning traffic either hits a deep pothole hard, or swerves into the middle of the road and oncoming traffic. Pothole is just outside the double yellow lines making it very difficult to avoid
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Bibury Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes across the street, 20th February
item.description:
Along the street coming out of 52 Orchard Way drive

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Orchard Way, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ash Tree located on Highway land problem, 20th February
item.description:
Resident has received an Ash Die Back - Road closure letter LD - caller is concerned that the land is private and/or not owned by Highways. Caller would like clarification of location and ownership
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land

item.title: Failed pothole repair, 20th February
